short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to rewrite text based on user-selected actions using OpenAI's API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make use of OpenAI's models via their API to draft and rewrite text and access AI in chat mode.

You must have API key for OpenAI (anyone can access GPT-3.5, for the time being but this is subject to change and you can use the Update Models function to check availability). But then you can use any model you have access to including finetuned ones.

Ally comes with plenty of stock prompts, which you can add to, delete or customize as you need.
